title: Subtraction Binomial Square Formula
text: We compare our expression to the subtraction binomial square formula: $${\left(a-b\right)}^2=a^2-2a b+b^2$$.
speech: We compare our expression to the subtraction binomial square formula:  parentheses a minus b,  squared is equal to a squared minus 2 a b, plus b squared .
pacedSpeech: We compare our expression to the subtraction binomial square formula:    a minus b,  squared is equal to a squared minus 2 a b, plus b squared

title: Identify $$b$$

title: Plug in the Terms
text: Substitute $$a=\frac{1}{8} x$$ and $$b=\frac{1}{9} y$$ into the subtraction binomial square formula:\n$${\left(a-b\right)}^2=a^2+2a b+b^2$$\n$${\left(\frac{1}{8} x-\frac{1}{9} y\right)}^2={\left(\frac{1}{8} x\right)}^2-2\frac{1}{8} x \frac{1}{9} y+{\left(\frac{1}{9} y\right)}^2$$
speech: Substitute  a is equal to, 1 eighth x,  and  b is equal to 1 ninth y  into the subtraction binomial square formula:\n, parentheses a minus b,  squared is equal to a squared plus 2 a b, plus b squared \n parentheses, 1 eighth x minus 1 ninth y  squared is equal to parentheses 1 eighth x,  squared minus, 2 and 1 eighth, x 1 ninth y plus, parentheses 1 ninth y,  squared
math: $${\left(\frac{1}{8} x-\frac{1}{9} y\right)}^2={\left(\frac{1}{8} x\right)}^2-2\frac{1}{8} x \frac{1}{9} y+{\left(\frac{1}{9} y\right)}^2$$
